BugInstance.message: Class org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.merge.MergeEngine holds a map-type field org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.merge.MergeEngine.engines, but uses it as only a List
Constructor new org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.merge.result.impl.memory.MemoryMergedResult(ShardingSphereRule, ShardingSphereSchema, SQLStatementContext, List) makes call to non-final method
